name: Midnight Suns is free to play this weekend, and on sale if you want to keep it on #Steam! It's also compatible with the #SteamDeck which I didn't know. I played it quite a bit on my PC before I moved, but I haven't tried it on the deck yet. I liked the game, it wasn't what I expected but in a good way!#Gaming #Gaymer #Free store.steampowered.com/app/368

name:
Throwback Thursday: the Riverwalk
15 years ago, my (now) husband and I went for a stroll down the Riverwalk in Wilmington, NC. As we used to do back in the day, we carried our point-and-shoot cameras and took tons of pictures. Looking at these pictures today fills me with joy. Great memories!#ThrowbackThursday

name:
Wordle 607
#Wordle 607 4/6â¬›â¬›ðŸŸ¨â¬›â¬›ðŸŸ¨â¬›ðŸŸ¨â¬›â¬›ðŸŸ¨â¬›ðŸŸ¨â¬›â¬›ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©When I get a yellow letter I usually try to find its correct position in the following attempts. This time I went for the strategy where you try to find more letters first. So, in each attempt I didn't use any of the letters in the previous attempts. By step 3 I had all 5 letters of the solution. It was fun, I may keep trying to play this way in the future!
